keyMappings:
# Insert your preferred key mappings here.

map ח scrollDown
map ל scrollUp
map ג scrollFullPageDown
map ו scrollFullPageUp
map עע scrollToTop
map ר reload
map טט copyCurrentUrl
map טכ LinkHints.activateModeToCopyLinkUrl
map פ openCopiedUrlInCurrentTab
map ן enterInsertMode
map ה enterVisualMode
map כ LinkHints.activateMode
map עכ nextFrame
map עF mainFrame
map ם Vomnibar.activate
map נ Vomnibar.activateBookmarks
map . enterFindMode
map מ performFind
map עא nextTab
map עT previousTab
map ע0 firstTab
map ע$ lastTab
map א createTab
map טא duplicateTab
map ס removeTab
map <a-פ> togglePinTab
map ען focusInput
map צ Marks.activateCreateMode
map \ Marks.activateGotoMode
map <a-צ> toggleMuteTab
map עק Vomnibar.activateEditUrl
map עE Vomnibar.activateEditUrlInNewTab

unmap [[
unmap ]]
searchEngines:
w: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia

# More examples.
#
# (Vimium supports search completion Wikipedia, as
# above, and for these.)
#
g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
y: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
gm: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google maps
az: https://www.amazon.com/s/?field-keywords=%s Amazon
